description: Aspose.Slides is a PowerPoint management library for working with Microsoft PowerPoint files without using Microsoft PowerPoint. It allows developers to work with PPT, PPS, POT, PPTX, PPSX, POTX and ODP files on ASP.NET web applications, web services and Windows applications.
releaseNotes:
This release introduces the features, enhancements and bug fixes as detailed below:
	
	New Features:

SLIDESNET-33794        Support for specifying category axis interval unit
SLIDESNET-33799        Setting the category axis text rotation angle
SLIDESNET-33821        Provide feature for InvertIfNegative option for chart series
SLIDESNET-33866        Support for using HyperlikBase property in DocumentProperties
SLIDESNET-33934        [PowerPoint to TIFF] Add support for setting image properties
 
	Investigations:

SLIDESNET-31657        Joining connector to shapes in PPTX
SLIDESNET-33882        The presentation writing is slow in Aspose.Slides for .NET
SLIDESNET-33936        Does Aspose.Slides support ASP.NET Web Pages 2?
SLIDESNET-33938        Does Aspose.Slides support ASP.NET MVC 4
 

	Bugs:

SLIDESNET-33213        Pie chart color changes on saving presentation
SLIDESNET-33446        Presentation with SmartArt (layout/vList3) is corrupted after saving
SLIDESNET-33466        Presentation Repair message on editing chart in presentation
SLIDESNET-33656        Font color changed in cloned presentation
SLIDESNET-33707        Protected View message on cloning PPT Slides
SLIDESNET-33724        The wrong chart title text formatting in the generated thumbnail
SLIDESNET-33755        Setting the LineFormat for value axis line
SLIDESNET-33782        Setting Label position does not work
SLIDESNET-33793        Removing the chart category still renders the chart in generated presentation
SLIDESNET-33798        TextProperties for secondary category and value axis return null
SLIDESNET-33810        Updating OleObjectFrameEx objectData failed using InsertClone
SLIDESNET-33817        Source Master layout slide is improperly applied to cloned slide
SLIDESNET-33819        Setting image to marker fill to picture type does not work
SLIDESNET-33838        InvalidCastException on loading the presentation
SLIDESNET-33839        NullReference exception on accessing the presentation
SLIDESNET-33877        The sectors of the pie chart are rotated in generated PDF
SLIDESNET-33879        Slide header footer does not get update when slides are cloned
SLIDESNET-33883        Font changes to wingding on cloning slide
SLIDESNET-33888        Extra spaces are rendered between characters in generated PDF
SLIDESNET-33901        Slide background color changes in generated PDF
SLIDESNET-33911        Cloning slides from the ppt file created by pre-2007 PowerPoint results a broken file.
SLIDESNET-33932        NullReference Exception on accessing Chart Value axis Format properties
SLIDESNET-33933        Wmf image is rendered incorrectly during ppt to pdf conversion.
SLIDESNET-33940        Arrow symbols in PPT Table cells fail to render properly
SLIDESNET-33941        The Value axis label with maximum value missing in generated PDF
SLIDESNET-33942        Bar chart colors are improperly rendered in generated PDF
SLIDESNET-33943        Major Horizontal Grid lines appearing in Bar charts in exported PDF
SLIDESNET-33952        InvalidCastException on accessing the presentation
summary: Aspose.Slides is a PowerPoint management library for working with Microsoft PowerPoint files without using Microsoft PowerPoint. It allows developers to work with PPT, PPS, POT, PPTX, PPSX, POTX and ODP files on ASP.NET web applications, web services and Windows applications. It allows you to open files and manipulate the elements of the presentation from adding slides and managing variety of shapes and working with text to more complex elements like presentation protection, slide animations, charts and SmartArt rendering.The presentations can be exported to PDF, TIFF, XPS, SVG, PNG, JPEG, BMP or EMF formats.
title: Aspose.Slides for .NET
